Travelers can save upto 38% on beach destinations reveals Expedia
Travel analysts at Expedia.com, one of the world’s largest full-service online travel sites, examined savings to popular “shoulder season” destinations such as the Caribbean, Mexico and Hawaii. On average, U.S. travelers can save 13% on travel to Hawaii, 12% on travel to Mexico and 11% on travel to the Caribbean this fall. Shoulder season is the period between off-season and high-season, when good deals and good weather often meet.
Focusing on the top ten origin markets in the United States, including New York, Chicago, Los Angeles and Houston, the team analyzed differences in airline average ticket prices and hotel average daily rates in this upcoming shoulder season (September 1 – October 31, 2015) versus the summer high season (June 1 – August 31, 2015) to Miami, Hawaii, Mexico and the Caribbean.
“Fall is in ideal time to save on travel to some of American’s favorite domestic and international beach destinations,” says Expedia Senior Editor Ingrid Belobradic. “As a bonus, sizzling temperatures cool off to a more bearable degree.”
Average Savings on Flights
Destination Average Ticket Price (ATP) Hawaii -17% Mexico (Cabo, PV, Cancun) -8% Caribbean -7% Average Savings on Hotels
Destination Average Daily Rate (ADR) Hawaii -9% Mexico (Cabo, PV, Cancun) -16% Caribbean -16% Best Hotel Deals
Destination Average Daily Rate (ADR) Grand Bahama -39% U.S. Virgin Islands -34% Mazatlan -31% Paradise Island, Bahamas -31% Turks & Caicos -20%
Standout hotel deals for the 2015 shoulder season in these popular destinations include: Mana Kai Maui in Hawaii for $140 per night; Soho Playa Hotel in Playa del Carmen, Mexico for $100 per night; Mia Reef Isla Mujeres in Cancun, Mexico for $183 per night; Red South Beach in Miami for $106 per night.
Expedia.com Fall Getaways Sale
To help shoulder season travelers get the most bang for their buck, Expedia is offering Expedia+ rewards members 2x points on fall hotels, flight + hotel packages, and cruises featured on the Autumn Promotion landing page on Expedia.com! To receive bonus points, visitors must register for the offer through the Autumn Promotion landing page or the Expedia+ rewards Marketplace page.
